title: Mimecast - TTP URL
description:
This dashboard provides information about the TTP URL
 generated on Mimecast Email Security.

definition.content:
Gain better visibility into your organization's security events by monitoring Mimecast TTP URL logs with this dashboard. Targeted Threat Protection(TTP) URL Protection is an email security service that rewrites all inbound email links and scans the destination website in real-time when clicked by the user.

This dashboard provides a comprehensive overview of email security and threat detection metrics, including total threat logs, email distribution by route, top recipients, event distribution by scan result, and more. 

For more information, see the [Mimecast Email Security Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/mimecast).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

Datadog Cloud SIEM analyzes and correlates TTP URL logs to detect threats to your environment in real time. If you don't see signals please make sure you've enabled [Datadog Cloud SIEM](/security?query=source%3Amimecast%20service%3Attp-url%20).
